rating_comment: Had a great stay. Robin and Sophia helped a lot and they were trying to ensure the guest is comfortable at every point of time. Till I vacated they were making sure things are all right. I will request them to keep this spirit forever.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Robin and Shaila were amazing hosts. They were very proactive and easy to talk to, going out of their way to make sure we had everything we needed. Dipto and Alamin are very kind and helpful, always doing everything so that we were comfortable in the apartment.
The rooms were spacious and well decorated, and the bathrooms were clean. The living room and dining areas are huge, and I always felt comfortable using the shared spaces in the apartment. The kitchen is small but functional. It has a lot of storage and is furnished with the equipment required to cook. They provided filtered water, which was appreciated.
The apartment is well located, a walking distance from cafés, restaurants, and grocery stores. The neighbourhood feels safe and is quiet in the evening.
Robin and Shaila have other apartments which are also very nice. I would definitely recommend for both short and long stays in Dhaka, and I will for sure stay with them again the next time I am in Dhaka

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: The property was well maintained and very clean. The bathroom was bigger than expected. The host is very professional and friendly, he provided everything before asking. The caretaker was very polite and helped us with all our needs. He prepared the room very nicely, turned the AC on before we entered the property. It was so relaxing to enter in a cold room in this heat. It was my last night in bd and everything went so well and smoothly. The location of the place is also really good as it was close to all the banani restaurants and very convenient to move from one place to another. I highly recommend to book any places with this host as the way he maintains his properties is a lot different than any other hosts in Bangladesh.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · October 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Great location, quiet, clean and modern flat, I would definitely recommend it. However, I suggest to replace the AC unit which is pretty bad.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · August 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
It’s a great experience to get a stay here, finally I found a good place next to my work place which is well maintained and properly coordinated. I prefer to stay here even for my future stays, this is not because I trust airbnb(I experienced an worst situation with my earlier stay from other host in the same town {DM Alvir’s place, Maati} but airbnb haven’t taken care of my complaints even after sharing images and so lost trust on airbnb)
I strongly recommend this property for your short & long term stays and this host & his team is always available just a message away to respond quickly to attend on your needs.

Good quite place though very near to all the stores and restaurants what you need every day staying in apartment. Well maintained new apartment with great wi fi connectivity. Nirob was always there to take care of you. Well managed by team of professionals Robin, Rahul Amin and Shaila.
